de.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Um Bilder zu speichern, benötigt {{appName}} Zugriff auf die Galerie.
de.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Um nahegelegene Orte zu finden, benötigt {{appName}} Zugriff auf den Standort.

en.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: {{appName}} wants to save photos to your library.
en.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: {{appName}} wants to use your location to find nearby cities.

es.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Para guardar imágenes, {{appName}} necesita un acceso a la galería.

fa.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: برای ذخیره تصاویر، {{appName}} نیاز به دسترسی به گالری دارد.

fr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pour enregistrer des photos, {{appName}} doit accéder à votre galerie.

hr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Za pohranjivanje slika {{appName}} mora imati pristup galeriji.

ku.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Jibo zexîrekirin anku xwedankirina wêneyan, {{appName}} hewcetî bi têketina nav Galeriyê heye.

pl.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Aby zapisać obrazy, {{appName}} potrzebuje dostępu do galerii.

ro.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pentru a stoca imagini, {{appName}} are nevoie de acces la galerie.

ru.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Чтобы сохранить снимки, приложению {{appName}} требуется доступ к галерее изображений.

so.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Si loo keydiyo sawirada, {{appName}} waxay u baahan tahay inay marin u hesho keydka sawirada.

ti.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: ስእልታት ንምዕቃብ፡ {{appName}} ናብቲ ጋለሪ/መኽዘን ስእሊ ናይ ምእታው ፍቓድ የድልዮ።

tr.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Resimleri kaydedebilmek için {{appName}}'in galeriye erişimi gerekmektedir.
